Params: {3: 'The sky opens up and rain pours down as if water from the whole world is converging here.'}
{3: 'Vera jumps onto the roof and finds the humanoid-hybrid Ascendant standing not far away. Lamia lifts her head slightly, looking at the sky, letting the rain hit her face.'}
{3: 'Despite not expecting her to listen, Vera still raises the banner spear in her hand and points it at Lamia, threatening her loudly.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I don't know what's your deal with this city."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'But you better disable the submergence command right this second, or this spear goes right through you, you hear me?'}
{3: 'The mermaid Ascendant turns her head toward Vera slowly. A strand of hair, wet from the rain, falls to the side with her movement, revealing her hollow-looking gaze.'}
{3: 'Vera knows that gaze intimately. The look of total desperation was once in her eyes as well.'}
{3: 'On that rainy day, after all her companions died, she also stood there, looking at the rainy sky, letting the rain hit her, hiding her tears in the rain.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "I'm not... going to give it to anyone.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lamia draws her twinblade, the edges of the curved blades looking like the arcs of comets flying across the night sky.'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'This is mine... Stop bothering this place... Sinkâ€”', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lamia cries, sorrowfully, and charges at Vera with her blade held high.'}
